COMMENT_TX: $Texas protested game because of safe call at 2B
ej,hallm001,P,hirsj901,Charging mound after HBP $Mel Hall charged the mound and was ejected by HP umpire John Hirschbeck

ej,fiskc001,P,kaisk901,Balls and strikes (while catching) ej,fregj101,M,kaisk901,Balls and strikes Carlton Fisk and White Sox manager Jim Fregosi ejected by HP umpire Ken Kaiser when a ball was called on Pat Tabler

ej,andes101,M,hendt901,Call at HP ej,gibsk001,P,hendt901,Call at HP (Bumped umpire) Kirk Gibson and Tigers manager Sparky Anderson ejected by HP umpire Ted Hendry after Gibson bumped Hendry during argument
ej,slatj001,P,cousd901,Throwing at Andre Thornton Jim Slaton ejected by HP umpire Derryl Cousins for throwing at Andre Thornton

ej,pinil001,M,roe-r901,Balls and strikes (Kicked dirt and threw cap) $Yankees manager Piniella ejected by HP umpire Roe for for arguing called strike to Tolleson; Piniella kicked dirt on HP and Roe's shoes and threw his cap
ej,weave801,M,younl901,Balls and strikes $Orioles manager Weaver ejected by HP umpire Young for arguing balls and strikes as he made pitching change
ej,willj107,M,cobld901,Balls and strikes Blue Jays manager Jimy Williams ejected by HP umpire Drew Coble arguing balls and strikes sometime in the first inning
